You should see the following output when running the movie
----------------------------------------------------------

Sun Oct 31 18:14:14 GMT+0100 2004 | de.audiofarm.code.logger.Application
[FINE] Application created
Sun Oct 31 18:14:14 GMT+0100 2004 | logging.PropertyLoader
[INFO] Start loading logging properties from 'logging.xml'
Sun Oct 31 18:14:14 GMT+0100 2004 | de.audiofarm.code.logger.Application
[FINE] Logging properties read
Sun Oct 31 18:14:14 GMT+0100 2004 | de.audiofarm.code.logger.Application
[INFO] XML loaded
<logRecord level="WARNING" name="de.audiofarm.code.logger.Application" date="2004-10-31T18:14:14">Parser Error: -9</logRecord>
Sun Oct 31 18:14:14 GMT+0100 2004 | de.audiofarm.code.logger.Application
[WARNING] Parser Error: -9
